Table 1. Comparison of the state-of-the-art direct cross-dataset evaluation results (%). MSMT17 (all) means all images are used for training, 
regardless of subset splits. M 3 L is trained on three datasets selected from CUHK03, Market-1501, DukeMTMC-reID, and MSMT17, while 
the other is held for testing. Results in gray cells are with within-dataset evaluation for a reference. "-" means not reported or not applicable.
